Package model

Interface Observable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Board
interface Observable
The Observable interface of the observer pattern (which is normally implemented by a Model) Contrary to a normal observer pattern, The Observable object is only observed by one other object (1:1 ratio of Observers and Observables). This is because this project is small and does not require multiple observers

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void notifyObserver()
    Notify the Observer of this Observable Object.
    void setObserver​(Observer observer)
    Set the Observer to notify whenever notifyObserver is called

  • Method Details

    • setObserver

      void setObserver​(Observer observer)
      Set the Observer to notify whenever notifyObserver is called
      Parameters:
      observer - The new observer

    • notifyObserver

      void notifyObserver()
      Notify the Observer of this Observable Object. This should only be called after changing the data in this Observable Object
